about_the_game:
THE EXPERIENCE

You find yourself in a strange, terrifying, and eerie place, where you will feel lonely and helpless.
The atmosphere of the game is designed to make you instill fear in yourself, drawing from your deepest phobias and emotions.
Something or someone is pursuing you, and this threat can catch up with you at the most inopportune moments.
You will face difficult decisions and the challenge of choosing your path.
What awaits you at the end of the journey remains a mystery that you must uncover.

THE GENRE

Psychological atmospheric horror.

THE GAMEPLAY

In a creepy, dark place, without fully understanding who you are, you’re faced with the choice of whether or not to care for a severely injured soldier who cannot move on his own. You have a map with a marked destination, but you don’t know what this place is or what awaits you at the end. However, you realize that the wounded soldier knows the locations of fallen supplies essential for survival. As fear, loneliness, and helplessness set in, and as you struggle with the scarcity of resources for both of you, you begin to lose your sanity. The situation gradually worsens, and at some point, you must decide whether to continue caring for the soldier or abandon him to proceed alone. Eventually, you realize that something—or someone—is following you. At the end of the ordeal, you will understand what really happened and who you are.

THE STORY

A military transport plane, carrying humanitarian cargo such as drinking water, food, and medical supplies, makes a crash landing. Soldiers were also on board, accompanying the cargo. After the crash, for reasons unknown, you find yourself in a dark, terrifying, and unusual place. You soon hear labored breathing and discover a severely injured soldier. His fate now depends on your actions. Stay strong and keep moving forward to reach the end of this ordeal and uncover who you are and where you’ve ended up. The most important thing is—don’t stop!

name: KEEP MOVING

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3470
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A psychological atmospheric horror game where you care for a wounded soldier, even though you don’t know who you are or where you are. It’s driving you mad!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
